configuration:
<% if hadoop_security_authentication == "kerberos" %>
mapreduce.jobtracker.kerberos.principal mapred/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
mapreduce.jobtracker.kerberos.https.principal host/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
mapreduce.jobtracker.keytab.file /etc/mapred.keytab
mapreduce.tasktracker.kerberos.principal mapred/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
mapreduce.tasktracker.kerberos.https.principal host/_HOST@<%= kerberos_realm %>
mapreduce.tasktracker.keytab.file /etc/mapred.keytab
mapred.task.tracker.task-controller org.apache.hadoop.mapred.LinuxTaskController
mapreduce.tasktracker.group mapred
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("mapred_acls_enabled") %>
mapred.acls.enabled <%= mapred_acls_enabled %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_jobtracker_taskscheduler") %>
mapred.jobtracker.taskScheduler <%= hadoop_jobtracker_taskscheduler %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_fairscheduler_assignmultiple") %>
mapred.fairscheduler.assignmultiple <%= hadoop_config_mapred_fairscheduler_assignmultiple %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_fairscheduler_sizebasedweight") %>
mapred.fairscheduler.sizebasedweight <%= hadoop_config_mapred_fairscheduler_assignmultiple %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_jobtracker_fairscheduler_weightadjuster") %>
mapred.fairscheduler.weightadjuster <%= hadoop_jobtracker_fairscheduler_weightadjuster %>
<% end %>
mapred.job.tracker <%= hadoop_jobtracker_host %>:<%= hadoop_jobtracker_port%>
mapred.local.dir <%= mapred_data_dirs.join(",") %> true
mapred.child.java.opts -Xmx1024m
mapreduce.jobtracker.staging.root.dir /user
mapred.system.dir /mapred/system
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_child_ulimit") %>
mapred.child.ulimit <%= hadoop_config_mapred_child_ulimit %>
<% else %>
mapred.child.ulimit unlimited
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_io_sort_mb") %>
io.sort.mb <%= hadoop_config_io_sort_mb %>
<% else %>
io.sort.mb 256
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_io_sort_factor") %>
io.sort.factor <%= hadoop_config_io_sort_factor %>
<% else %>
io.sort.factor 64
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_job_tracker_handler_count") %>
mapred.job.tracker.handler.count <%= hadoop_config_mapred_job_tracker_handler_count %> true
<% else %>
mapred.job.tracker.handler.count 10 true
<% end %>
mapred.map.tasks.speculative.execution true
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_parallel_copies") %>
mapred.reduce.parallel.copies
<%= hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_parallel_copies %>
<% else %>
mapred.reduce.parallel.copies
5
<% end %>
mapred.reduce.tasks
30
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_tasks_speculative_execution") %>
mapred.reduce.tasks.speculative.execution <%= hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_tasks_speculative_execution %>
<% else %>
mapred.reduce.tasks.speculative.execution false
<% end %>
mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
<%= [1, processorcount.to_i * 0.80].max.round %> true
mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
<%= [1, processorcount.to_i * 0.20].max.round %> true
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_tasktracker_http_threads") %>
tasktracker.http.threads <%= hadoop_config_tasktracker_http_threads %> true
<% else %>
tasktracker.http.threads 60 true
<% end %>
mapred.output.compression.type BLOCK If the job outputs are to compressed as SequenceFiles, how should they be compressed? Should be one of NONE, RECORD or BLOCK.
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_use_compression") %>
mapred.compress.map.output <%= hadoop_config_use_compression %>
<% else %>
mapred.compress.map.output false
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_slowstart_completed_maps") %>
mapred.reduce.slowstart.completed.maps <%= hadoop_config_mapred_reduce_slowstart_completed_maps %>
<% end %>
<% if has_variable?("hadoop_jobtracker_thrift_port") %>
jobtracker.thrift.address 0.0.0.0:<%= hadoop_jobtracker_thrift_port %>
<% end %> <% if has_variable?("hadoop_mapred_jobtracker_plugins") %>
mapred.jobtracker.plugins <%= hadoop_mapred_jobtracker_plugins %> Comma-separated list of jobtracker plug-ins to be activated.
<% end %> <% if has_variable?("hadoop_mapred_tasktracker_plugins") %>
mapred.tasktracker.instrumentation <%= hadoop_mapred_tasktracker_plugins %>
<% end %>
